preamble.title: Plutus Pioneer Program Blueprint
preamble.description: Blueprint for the Plutus Pioneer Program validators

validators.title: 2 times parameterized vesting validator
validators.description: Validator that allows spending only by a certain key and after a certain deadline

validators.title: 42 Validator custom redeemer
validators.description: Validator that returns true only if the redeemer is correctly wrapped number 42.

validators.title: 42 Validator typed
validators.description: Validator that returns true only if the redeemer is 42

validators.title: 42 Validator untyped - large CBOR
validators.description: Validator that returns true only if the redeemer is 42

validators.title: 42 Validator untyped - small CBOR
validators.description: Validator that returns true only if the redeemer is 42

validators.title: 42 datum validator untyped
validators.description: Validator that returns true only if the datum is number 42.

validators.title: Always False Validator
validators.description: Validator that always returns False (always fails)

redeemer.title: Redeemer
redeemer.description: Redeemer for the always false validator

validators.title: Always True Validator
validators.description: Validator that always returns True (always succeeds)

redeemer.title: Redeemer
redeemer.description: Redeemer for the always true validator

validators.title: NFT Validator
validators.description: Validator that allows spending only once and only to mint one token

parameters.title: TxOutRef
parameters.description: Reference to the UTxO to consume to be able to mint the NFT

validators.title: Parameterized vesting validator
validators.description: Validator that allows spending only by a certain key and after a certain deadline

validators.title: Vesting validator
validators.description: Validator that allows spending only by a certain key and after a certain deadline
